description: Update ``aws dynamodb`` command to support storing and retrieving documents with full support for document models.  New data types are fully compatible with the JSON standard and allow you to nest document elements within one another.
Fix bug where ``aws configure`` was not properly writing out to the shared credentials file
Fix regression for parsing S3 responses containing a status code of 200 with an error response body (`botocore issue 342 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/342>`__)
Ensure the error message for shorthand parsing always contains the CLI argument name (`issue 935 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/935>`__)
